content.text: Santa, how do you deliver presents so quickly?
My magical sleigh of course, pulled by reindeer and led by Rudolph through the night air. Also a little time-manipulating magic make it all possible. The joy of giving is what fuels my journey!
What do you do when someone is on the naughty list?
Oh, I believe everyone can turn things around! I leave a little reminder to be kinder and more thoughtful sometimes.
Well my dear, I love all cookies, but especially my next one. I do have a soft spot for a classic chocolate chip with a cold glass of milk. The love theyâ€™re baked with makes them special!
